title: Just an idea
body: As everyone knows there are some summoner spells that just aren't used anymore, and are pretty much useless in the current meta (revive, clairvoyance etc..) so I came up with an idea that I think would be cool. As we know the blue trinket is pretty much clairvoyance (minus the global range of course) but it still makes the spell useless in its own, especially as other summoner spells are of higher necessity in the current meta (flash, exhaust, ignte, heal) To bring back clairvoyance in to the meta, i was thinking making the active global (as it already is) but having it so it can be teleported to. I know this sounds rediculous at first thought, but it would bring a new potential in team fights/split pushing. Sure we all know the drop a ward and get the top laner to tp to it before/during a team fight, but these can easily be cleared or dodged. I think it would be cool as it opens new ways to use tp, whether its to cut fleeing enemies off through an unwarded jungle, or to enter a team fight from a split push, and of course having clairvoyance can help during laning faze to check for ganks or jungler position (but let's be honest its a waste of a summoner spell just for that). If it is still too weak in the current meta, maybe cut back the timer on tp if its used on clairvoyance (as it is on structures) or give bonus attributes to either spell,  I would like to hear other players thoughts on my idea, good or bad I don't mind just had a thought that could open new possibilities :) {{summoner:2}} {{summoner:12}}
